Package ru.nikitat0.graph

Interface Graph

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdjacencyList, AdjacencyMatrix
public interface Graph
A graph data structure with basic operations for managing vertices and edges.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method

    Applies the given action to each vertex adjacent to the specified vertex.
    void

    Applies the given action to each vertex until all vertices have been processed or the action throws an exception.

  • Method Details

    • addVertex

      int addVertex()
      Adds a new vertex to the graph.
      Returns:
      the identifier of the added vertex

    • hasVertex

      boolean hasVertex(int u)
      Returns true if graph contains vertex with given number.
      Parameters:
      u - the number of vertex.
      Returns:
      true if graph contains vertex with given number

    • removeVertex

      void removeVertex(int u)
      Removes a vertex from the graph.
      Parameters:
      u - the identifier of the vertex
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the vertex does not exist

    • addEdge

      void addEdge(int u, int v)
      Adds a new edge to the graph. Does nothing if the edge already exists.
      Parameters:
      u - the identifier of the first vertex
      v - the identifier of the second vertex
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either u or v doesn't belongs to the graph

    • removeEdge

      void removeEdge(int u, int v)
      Removes an edge from the graph. Does nothing if there is no such edge.
      Parameters:
      u - the identifier of the first vertex
      v - the identifier of the second vertex
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either u or v doesn't belongs to the graph

    • getVertexNumberUpperBound

      int getVertexNumberUpperBound()
      Returns the current upper bound for vertex number.
      Returns:
      the current upper bound for vertex number

    • forEachVertex

      void forEachVertex(IntConsumer action)
      Applies the given action to each vertex until all vertices have been processed or the action throws an exception.
      Parameters:
      action - the action to be performed for each element

    • forEachAdjacent

      void forEachAdjacent(int u, IntConsumer action)
      Applies the given action to each vertex adjacent to the specified vertex.
      Parameters:
      u - the vertex identifier
      action - the action to perform on each adjacent vertex
